title: Ticket #1989: APPEND_REQUIREMENTS should be done by condor_schedd, not submitter
description:
APPEND_REQUIREMENTS is currently used by condor_submit; I claim that this really should be moved to the condor_schedd. Why? If a user is submitting directly to the schedd (either via condor_submit, SOAP, or Condor-C), they likely have no clue what the APPEND_REQUIREMENTS the pool needs.

Where else would this be useful? If I setup a Condor-C gateway to our site that uses the condor_job_router to transform incoming jobs (maybe I convert an incoming vanilla job to a PBS job?), I want to prevent jobs from starting until the router has been given a chance to transform it.
